website_summaries.verdict: If you want a larger baby bathtub and don't need the bells and whistles of other models, this could be the one for you.
pros: A basic model that fits children up to two years
We love that it is BPA- and phthalate-free
cons: Its large size makes it awkward to move and impractical for small sinks

customer_reviews.title: Simple, practical and can hang on the wall to save space.
customer_reviews.text: Simple and practical tub. Bought this because I didn't want to buy multiple tubs to accommodate a growing baby, but it is a very big tub, and we have a small place with limited space. So I also got the Shells® Version 2 Heavy Duty Vacuum Suction Cups Hooks Hangers  Used one of these to hang the baby tub on the shower wall. Works really well to save space while the tub is drying after use.
customer_reviews.author: Yan

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I wanted something bigger than the standard baby tub like I had for my first kid. This tub is very spacious and sturdy. Able to support your child from infancy to being a toddler. My newborn was born premature at 4 lbs 13 oz and she fit the baby spot well. I did purchase the yellow baby bath sponge for additional support. My only con was that i was unable to use this tub over the sink like the other baby tubs - i use it on the bed for now because I'm recovering from a c section and bending over a tub is too strenous.
customer_reviews.author: Missy2beTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Spa bath, made in the USA.
customer_reviews.text: My family relocated to Texas, and I bought a 2nd one of these bath. I suppose my child is old enough to bathe directly in the tub (14 months), but he really enjoys lying down during bath (who doesn't). I fill the water a little bit fuller than when he was a baby, he could play with his toys for a long time, like a spa treatment. Also want to highlight that the Primo bath is made in the USA, another reason I choose this product as I want to support our country's economy (and no I am not political).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No idea how this has good reviews.... One-star for me and my baby
customer_reviews.text: This product is an example of looking great on paper, but sucks in real life. Get one that suits your infant, then get another one later for the toddler. Combining sounds like a great idea, but it is too big bulky for your infant, then not convenient for your toddler. My toddler does not want to sit still but there is no room whatsoever to move. It has a bunch of 'barricades' on the bottom floor. I would say even dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, worth buying! Safe for newborn and for single mom!
customer_reviews.author: Patty R.

customer_reviews.title: Best Bathtub!!!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this tub! It's big, easy to clean and we can use it for years to come. I took the other reviewers suggestion and purchased the terry cloth seashell bath pillow to give our baby back support. Everything works perfectly, she enjoys splashing around and playing in her tub. It also has the water release plug, so you don't have to dump the water. You just unplug and the water drains! I'd definitely recommend to friends and family! I purchased this when my baby was around 8.5 months, she's now 10 months!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Reign

customer_reviews.title: Not for a toddler who likes to stand during bath time
customer_reviews.text: This might be good for the “safe” way to bathe, but if your toddler is one who likes to stand during bath time, this thing is horrible. Not a good flat spot to stand other than one small spot. Too many uneven spots... guess it’s time to graduate to the full tub.
customer_reviews.author: esulivant

customer_reviews.title: Its HUGE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tub!!! It fits my 1 year old my 3 yeAr old an in a few weeks my new born im sure! Where has this been all my life!!!!! Ive attached a picture of the old tub ive been using for my kids compared to this new tub!!! My kids have so much room!!!!! RECOMMEND HANDS DOWN I wish i found this sooner
customer_reviews.author: Ciera

customer_reviews.title: Beware: Lettering Scratches back!
customer_reviews.text: We thought the baby had eczema on her back but it turns out the “MAX FILL LINE” lettering inside the tub was scratching up her back every time we bathed her! No wonder she was upset during the bath. Really poor choice for hard scratchy lettering.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift to give!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best tub for infants and toddlers!! Bought two of these! After realizing my infant was far too squirmy for the sink systems- I caved and bought a few plastic bath tubs. No matter what I used my baby either squirmed away or the material sling molded. This tub is a life saver!! I now buy it as a gift for every baby shower!!
customer_reviews.author: carag

customer_reviews.title: Nice tub!
customer_reviews.text: I originally used $60 tub with my little one but it was so difficult to give him bath by myself. My husband's frequently away on business trip so I needed something better. I was skeptical with this low priced tub but it solved the problem! I can easily bath my 4months by myself and he also seems to be more comfortable in this tub! Just note that it is a hugeeeee tub. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mark K.

customer_reviews.title: Shipped with no box or wrapping?!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The tub seems nice and sturdy with lots of space. Cons: It was shipped with no box or even wrapping around it. It's covered in dust (I'm assuming from the factory or from transit). It has several large black marks on it from bumping against things during transit. It could have at the very least had some sort of plastic around it for protection..
customer_reviews.author: Titus Naive

customer_reviews.title: Works even for bigger toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when my son was about 19 months old. The one he had was getting some yucky mold under one of the pieces (whale of a tub) and I realized I prefer to see every part of the tub to void having hidden surprises. My son is 3.5 and I still bathe him there if he doesn't feel like taking a shower. It makes more sense than wasting a ton of water filling up the Jacuzzi tub. I have a three month old too and have recently started using it for her as well. I like the durability of this tub and how easy it is to clean
customer_reviews.author: Zenubya

customer_reviews.title: The only issue I had was it's not the best material so you have to scrub it clean or ...
customer_reviews.text: It's HUGE. Thankfully it fits into my tub though. My infant is about 16 lbs. and he started splashing a bit too much when we had him on a smaller tub on top of our bathroom counter top. When we put this on our counter top since his feet doesn't touch the end yet it doesn't make a huge mess every where. It's thin plastic so it's light. The only issue I had was it's not the best material so you have to scrub it clean or else it can leave a residue. However it's the same issue with most infant tubs so no complaints about it and I give it a full 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jae and sika

customer_reviews.title: Very large but very nice.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our newborn. It works but I feel hes a bit short at 21 inches still. We used it wheb he was 19 inches and it was ok. He wasnt gonna go anywhere. We also purchased the stand. You def need a full bath to utilize it. I suppose it would be a good alternative if you only have a shower. We like it. Wish it came with a hose to help with draining
customer_reviews.author: liljsully

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, light weight, perfect for growing babies
customer_reviews.text: Normally don’t provide reviews, but I really like this tub. My daughter is four months old and in the 90th percentile for hight and she has quickly outgrown her baby tub. I saw this and read the reviews and thought to give it a try. Despite the size, it is light weight. The molded positioning on the back was perfect for her. The minute I put her in their, she was kicking and smiling away. The drain at the bottom is convenient. The one drawback would be storage, but for the price, worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Leirer

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: We have used this to bath our child in since she was one month old, and she is almost 6 months old and I think we might have another month before she is too big to bathe in it. It works pretty good, but honestly the little thing in the middle that keeps them from sinking down in the tub is more of a hinderance than helpful. It just makes it pretty difficult for you too get there heads down in the water. If I would have paid closer attention in the beginning I probably would have looked for a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great bath to use for premies into toddlers.
customer_reviews.text: My twin boys were born at 30 weeks weighing 3.5 lbs. After spending time in the NICU, they were finally able to come home but were still quite small only weighing about 5lbs. This bath is great and gives good support for smaller babies. It is great that has an area for toddlers to sit up to as my boys got bigger. Worth the price and is a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: shea

customer_reviews.title: Great for big babies
customer_reviews.text: We have a big baby. She is upper 90’s percentile for height and weight which means she has outgrown her little blue baby bathtub before she is able to sit up. I thought we were out of luck, but then I found this tub. I absolutely love it. The bump that goes between their legs is nice and high. We had a problem of her sliding off in the old tub. The grooves on the side are wide enough for you to get where you need to but tight enough that the baby can’t roll to the side. The recline was so much better for washing her hair as well. Sturdy, but also lightweight. So glad we bought this tub!
customer_reviews.author: BAS

customer_reviews.title: Great to grow with baby
customer_reviews.text: While this tub is quite large, it's excellent. It JUST fits in our bathtub, and we love the grow-with-me style of it. One side for your laying down, small baby, and the other for your sitting-up baby. The only real complaint is that the side where baby lays down is hard on her head. When baby starts moving around, the hard plastic, the curves in that area, hurt her. We've taken to putting a folded towel under her head so the hard plastic doesn't hurt her when she's wiggling around. Otherwise, like I said, it's great. It fits in nicely next to our cabinet or we just leave it in the tub to try, only taking it out when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Rikki

customer_reviews.title: Big is Good!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be way too big for my newborn, but I put a bath sponge underneath to keep from slipping. A hand towel would work, too. I ended liking the size, because I can easily scoop up water from the other side for rinsing. Plus, I think the water stays warmer longer than with a smaller tub with less water in it. Baby seems comfortable in it and loves bath time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware! Read the dimensions!!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice tub, but it’s absolutely massive! It’s almost the size of our regular tub. I’m not sure why you wouldn’t just put your toddler in the normal tub at that point. Was looking for a tub for our newborn, and although this technically CAN be used with a newborn, it’s so overkill and huge, I literally have no where to store this. Have to send back and buy something smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney B

customer_reviews.title: Great tub!
customer_reviews.text: I great baby tub! I wish I had this when my little one was smaller (she’s now 10 months), but I’m thrilled that I will get more use out of this tub because it’s so big! Love that it’s one piece which makes it easy to clean (had to toss our old baby tub because I found hidden mold!!) Can’t beat the price on this either. Just FYI it is larger than your average baby bath, so keep that in mind for storage. It does fit in my standard size bath tub.
customer_reviews.author: BrightEyes84

customer_reviews.title: Arrived used?!!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived dirty and lots of stain. Very disappointed! Really nasty stains/markings.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great size - just genius
customer_reviews.text: Best baby bath tub ever Buy it now. You will not regret. Forget about all the tiny little tubs on the market that you can only use for a few months We ran into this problem when my son was about 4/5 months old. He was too big for the baby tub but couldn’t sit unassisted. Also i don’t want to fill the adult tub all the time just to give him a quick bath so this was such a great purchase. He is still laying in it (8 months old) and I’m sure we can use it for a few more years.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Heffinger

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life
customer_reviews.text: This is the only baby tub worth buying as long as you have room for it in your bathroom. I looked for a tub that my toddler could use for a year or so before finding this. For some reason they don't really make tubs for toddlers. This thing has a newborn/infant side for which I bought the large sponge type insert for and it has a toddler side my 3 year old is currently using. So pleased with this purchase since both my newborn and toddeer will be able to use.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Buy! Don’t hesitate!
customer_reviews.text: We registered for and her gifted a different bath when our little one was born. We quickly grew out of it and was still to small to move to our large bathtub so a friend recommended this! I wish we had had it from the beginning! He is now 14 months and I plan to use it as long as possible. He feels safe and secure and it’s big enough that he can splash and play to his hearts content. Don’t hesitate!
customer_reviews.author: HSell14

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.text: We love this thing! We bought it for our 4 month old and he loves it! There is the perfect area for him to lounge and provides space for when he transitions to sitting. The hump in the middle prevents him from sliding down and keeps him perfectly positioned during bath. Super easy to move around in the bathroom and very lightweight when empty. Perfect transition between infant tub and regular bath tub.
customer_reviews.author: paul nichols

customer_reviews.title: Spacious great bath !
customer_reviews.text: IN love with this bath because there is so much room to kick and play. Not the greatest for a newborn because the way it makes them lie down so low you can’t fill up the water enough to cover their belly. So I started using this when he was a few months older. He lovesss it. I feel bad to take him out. Best part of his day. Great bath.
customer_reviews.author: Koosman09

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money and great as baby grows!
customer_reviews.text: Got this along with the foam comfort pad for newborn. This tub is HUGE! Perfect for not having to purchase something bigger when baby grows. The plug in the bottom is super handy for draining and it can be hung up for space saving! I’ve recommended it to all my expectant mommy friends!
customer_reviews.author: My wish list

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tub
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! Perfect for a growing baby. My son is 8 months old and he’s super tall. He can sit up in it perfectly and comfortable with tons of room for toys and room to grow. We have a stand up shower so we needed something besides a sink for him to bathe in. It’s also deep enough to keep him warm and cozy. The other side is worded for babies who can’t sit-up.... it is pretty large and haven’t figured out where to store it yet but totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: chris gray

customer_reviews.title: The only bathtub you need!
customer_reviews.text: Forget all the other overpriced tubs. This is the only one you need. I wish someone would have told me sooner. I got the 4moms tub (and it wasn’t cheap) and it worked great but my son outgrew it pretty fast, but he wasn’t old enough to be in the regular bathtub in his own. And that’s when I started browsing and found this one. It’s perfect. You can use it with your newborn until ready to move to the adult bathtub. Highly recommend! Also, the fact that it doesn’t break the bank it’s an added bonus
customer_reviews.author: Aulona

customer_reviews.title: IT GROWS
customer_reviews.text: I was really expecting a small tub. no I did not look at the size really. but it is worth every penny. I love how it grows with my babies or should I say my babies grows with it. the built in lay back seat - for babies and the deep area for infant and toddlers which can sit up . a lot of room for THEM to make a splash. I think I can even fit in it with them...... nah just kidding
customer_reviews.author: greatnessiamcom

customer_reviews.title: Great tub! Especially for bigger babies!!
customer_reviews.text: My boy was born at 11#12oz and at 2 months is over 16. Bought multiple tubs that didn’t work and finally found out about this on an old blog post while googling. This tub is amazing for big babies and kids! It’s huge like others said and has a nice area that holds the baby up. I use it in combo with the cloud baby (tub but really only use the pad part in this tub). It works great we can keep baby comfortable and warm. Bathtime is so much fun now!! Thank you for making such a great product for big babies!
customer_reviews.author: TallGirl030709

customer_reviews.title: Buy this tub!
customer_reviews.text: I have a big baby! We bought him a regular infant tub but he's grown too long for the sling and can wiggle out of it, but his torso control isn't good enough for assisted seated position. This tub is perfect for him! He enjoyed his first bath in it so much. Highly recommended for large babies!
customer_reviews.author: Anna E.

customer_reviews.title: I'm so glad to find a baby bath tub large enough for ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad to find a baby bath tub large enough for my baby to have play room. Unlike the other ones on the market, which holds the baby but leave no room for toys and play, this tub offers two sitting positions and it's wide enough so I can easily move my baby from one side to the other in the water. It's great for babies 6 months and up. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Christie L.

customer_reviews.title: So great!
customer_reviews.text: This tub is awesome. I wish I would’ve bought it sooner but it’s still great for my almost 1 year old. I love it because it’s such a large size yet it fits perfectly in our standard tub/shower and he always has a clean tub ready to use. Our little guy is allergic to lots of soaps, so having this I don’t feel like I have to clean the shower the rest of us use every single day before he gets his bath. Love it - worth every penny! Have recommended it to lots of friends!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I love this tub and how my baby can comfortably sit without me having to hold him on fear of him sliding. Let me start by saying this tub is huge ( toddler can easy sit in it no problem) so don’t buy this if you don’t have much storage space in your bathroom because it does not fold or collapse. Love how you can easily drain the water without having to tilt the entire thing over.
customer_reviews.author: Saira

customer_reviews.title: Great for babies who are being in milestones.
customer_reviews.text: This tub has been extremely helpful, the only thing that would make it better is if it came with a net or pad for the baby to have a cushion. It is easy to clean and large enough for my baby to grow with. She has a mitochondrial disease that makes it hard to sit up, this tub is big enough for her to safely lay in with room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large, bulky, not practical for apartments, but sturdy and easy to move around
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a baby gift off my niece’s registry. I thought a folding bathtub would be more practical, but this is the one she wanted. It is made for a baby as well as a toddler so I guess that’s what she was going for. It seems very sturdy and easy to clean. She had not had the baby yet, so I dont know how it actually works out for her, but it is a nice tub if you have room to store it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I loveeeee this bathtub. I got it a couple months ago when my baby was learning to sit up and it worked perfect for our situation. There's a spot to lay and a spot to sit up. Plus I love the fact that only she uses it and I don't have to wash the big big tub out when in give her a bath, save water too. Also easy to clean. It is big but I just bought a waterproof suction thing and I hang it up on the shower wall. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Simple efficient and easy to clean!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tub, I got it as a baby shower gift and I have been using it for my 8month old’s baths since birth. It’s very easy to clean, and has support for baby as she grows. The cork is pretty good, no leaks so far although I don’t drain it using the cork I simply tilt the tub over and drain the water.
customer_reviews.author: LG_Infinia fan

customer_reviews.title: I had this tub 15 years ago and buy it for everyone!  It is a continual hit.
customer_reviews.text: I had this tub for my kids and passed it to a friend. It is one of the things I wish I had kept. It is an amazing product if you have the room. (I simply kept it in the tub and then put it on the floor when an adult used the space. If you are in a tiny bathroom, that may not work.). It holds an infant in place easily and then allows a toddler to sit in the water safely. I have bought this for many people since then. Everyone else loves it too! Simple and practical, this is a classic! I even used to pay shipping before amazon carried it. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Balakos

customer_reviews.title: The first and last baby bath you will purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this tub! It’s the fourth and final bath I purchased. I will say that this tub is large so you need to make sure you have the space. Beyond that, it’s amazing. Sturdy, no parts that can smell or get mildew, baby fits from infant through toddler and the baby doesn’t slide down at all. It was so nice to sit and actually be able to bathe my child instead of holding them or constantly pulling them up. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This bath saved my bath time life! AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tub! After trying a couple others, 3rd times a charm. It’s just necessary. He loves it so much and looks forward to bathtime. It has the right support so he can just lounge and enjoy the water. I have a 3 month old and it’s amazing. You can’t fold it and it isn’t the easiest to store but if you have the space or a guest shower, just store it in the shower. I’m just happy that bath time is a happy time and not a crying time. Def reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Lissette Galindez

customer_reviews.title: A MUST have!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I recently moved into a place that doesn't have a tub. The tub we got from our baby shower had gotten too small, and our son is 18 lbs and 25 inches long at 6 months. This was a gem finding! Plenty of room for him to grow. He really enjoys all the extra room, kicking and splashing around :) I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kimiko Mars

customer_reviews.title: Nice bath for baby
customer_reviews.text: Love this tub. I had and angel care bath seat that baby hated. This is great because small babies can recline and once they can sit up you can use either side. Other reviewers mention that it is big and I guess it does have a large footprint but it is not an issue for us and it doesn’t seem to take too much water in my opinion. I wish I had bought this from the beginning it makes bathing easy.
customer_reviews.author: chelbel

customer_reviews.title: Good quality plastic but very Large
customer_reviews.text: Its a while lot larger than expected. Very awkward to clean. I’ll wait to comment any more until I actually get to try it out with baby (on the way). Its made in USA and of good quality plastic which is why I’m willing to try it.
customer_reviews.author: Bel

customer_reviews.title: Love this bathtub!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. It was hard for me to find a bathtub that was big enough for my really tall 5 month old baby who can’t sit yet. Most bathtubs that accommodate newborns are much smaller and her feet were touching the end. This tub is great because you can use it with baby laying down and later when they can sit, and I’m guessing probably well into their first and maybe second year. To make it more comfortable I did add this flower sink bath padding thing underneath.
customer_reviews.author: MiamiMamma

customer_reviews.title: Totally recommended
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this product. We initially bought the lotus flower since we live in an apartment. That didn’t work for us and when the baby turned 4 months we decided to buy a new one. We love it so far!!! Our baby is way more comfortable and able to play in the water. The product seems to be sturdy and although big is definitely a game changer for us.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Victoria Iribarren

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Large Tub
customer_reviews.text: The size of this tub is perfect for older infants and toddlers. I have a 24/7 daycare and this tub fits a lot of age groups. Easy to disinfect and sanitize. I had one just like this but we left it at the farm for relatives.
customer_reviews.author: Re

customer_reviews.title: Bigger room for chunky baby
customer_reviews.text: I love this tub, itself come with two sections. Infant and toddler. My boy is chunky he’s already 20lbs when he’s 4months old. Other brand tub just too small for him. This tub has bigger rooms, my boy can actually floating when I bath him, he loves it lol. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Luan H.

customer_reviews.title: Overall like this tub quite a bit
customer_reviews.text: Overall like this tub quite a bit. Two things though - it's slippery, so we'll be adding some of those adhesive non-slip stickers to the bottom - even just twisting around to look behind herself our baby has slipped sitting on her rear end in this tub. (She was big enough to sit up in the tub by the time we got this - we've never used the infant incline bathing position in this tub.) Also, the plug to drain the tub is within baby grabbing reach and because it's black it really stands out in a white tub - it proves irresistible to the baby. A small annoyance - I'd still overall recommend this tub.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Hill

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best baby bath tub. I went through three before finally finding this one. It is huge but we hang it on the back of the shower wall with a heavy duty suction hanger. It fits long babies with plenty of room to kick but also keeps them stabilized. Get this bathtub!
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Bugos

customer_reviews.title: HUGE! - Made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: My son is 5 months and 25 lbs and in the 99th percentile so needless to say he grew out of his 4 Moms bathtub pretty quick. I only wish we got this tub earlier! It's such a great size and since we live in an apartment I don't want my son in the bathtub here so I can just use this one! He will probably use it until he's at least 1. I would recommend this tub to anyone and I love how it is made in the USA, lead free, PVC and BPA free! While I'm not a huge fan of plastic I feel comfortable putting my son in this!
customer_reviews.author: MJB

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t know I could love a tub but I do!
customer_reviews.text: Other than the tub being sent really dusty and dirty, this tub is amazing! Fit my little newborn great. I did what other reviewers did and put a towel down first to create a rough surface baby can sit on. Happy with this purchase and at such a low price compared to other tubs on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Great tub
customer_reviews.text: This bath is great. It’s lightweight and roomy for my 7 month old. I have to fold up a hand towel and put it behind his head because the recline side looks like an awkward angle but baby has never complained. The drain plug is good so far, I’ve used others that had bad ones but this plug works great and is in a convenient spot to drain the tub while baby is in it if needed
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: It is very large
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's large, but have to say it's borderline annoyingly large. I thought it would fit cross-ways in my shower ( I measured my shower and compared to reported dimensions) but it did not. So I have to use it long ways and it takes up most of the space. Seriously considering cutting it with a Dremel to shorten it a bit. The baby to toddler capability is nice. The plug is nice and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mreiss

customer_reviews.title: Great tub
customer_reviews.text: My 10 month old son has special needs and cant hold his head up. He had out grown his Skip and Hop sling. This tub is perfect. Lots of space to grow. I highly recommend it for larger infants with special needs. Beware it is very large and almost as big as tub.
customer_reviews.author: Andelu78

customer_reviews.title: Awkward for 5 month old
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of the tub. It takes up 3/4 of the space of a normal tub. However its a bit awkward for my 5 month old who cannot sit unassisted yet. She likes to keep her legs straight but the triangular bump is in the way. Otherwise, once she can sit i’m sure she will like it better!
customer_reviews.author: Shananigans

customer_reviews.title: I ordered it and it is perfect. Bath time is now enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: I have a 11 month grandson who just recently dx with Infantile seizures. He does not sit, hold a cup or rattler, can roll one time and he has no muscle control and minimal head control. I had been using the infant tub but he was too long for it. I read the reviews but I did not see one in re: special needs child. I ordered it and it is perfect. Bath time is now enjoyable. He kicks his feet and splashes with his hands ( new accomplishments). My daughter is now going to order one for her house.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Big, Easy to Clean (no moldy foam!), it works.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it's big. It fits in our standard-sized tub, though. We hang it on the wall in the back of the shower/tub (heavy-duty adhesive hook) and that stores it nicely. It's very light when it is empty (can lift and hang up w/ one hand). It can be completely rinsed and cleaned (no foam to grow mold or always stay wet). Drain plug is fine, but I usually just tip it over to empty. Baby is still using infant side. Placing a hand towel or washcloth where baby will be reclined adds cushion and warms where baby's back touches plastic. I like that baby can be well supported. Fair price. Made in USA and recyclable!
customer_reviews.author: SKcat

customer_reviews.title: Room to grow
customer_reviews.text: This tub did not come in a box at all, the shipping label was stuck right to the tub. There were scuffs and spot where it looked like it was dentedand popped back out. Other than that, this tub works great. I love that it is big enough so my little guy can grow into it and should fit him for a few years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sambolin

customer_reviews.title: Best bathtub for babies from newborn to 18+ months
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best baby bathtub. We have been using it since our daughter was 2 months old, she is now 9 months old. With the two diff sides, it can transition with them as they age. I can see us using it for at least another year, if not more. Because of the great design, it also fills up very fast, which saves lots of water. The only possible improvement would be some kind of hole in the rim that would allow for hanging it up on a hook when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy A.

customer_reviews.title: Great tub, but sponge to
customer_reviews.text: Great baby tub and will be able to use for years because it is quite large. Definitely but the “summer infant bath sponge” to go with this tub. It’s cheap and makes bathing so much more pleasant for your baby!
customer_reviews.author: BeeLeigh

customer_reviews.title: Large, sturdy, well-made.
customer_reviews.text: It is well made, sturdy, and large. It may be a little large for a 0-4 months (or less than 14 lbs) infant; the infant may slide/slip around. I recommend 2 person assist for the bathing that age/weight group. After 4 months (or more than 14 lbs), the infant is likely to fit better in the tub and not slide/slip around much. For the price, it is better made than most tubs available at Walmart. Due to it's size, it may not fit well in a small stand-up showers. It is likely to fit well in most regular (Alcove tubs) showers/tubs. I wish it would drain water easily.
customer_reviews.author: Knight

customer_reviews.title: Large baby tub
customer_reviews.text: Great tub very big and can hold a ton of water. Works for toddlers and infants. Only wish is that it had some type of traction pad or something. Gets slippery specially if you have a child that love to stand when bathing.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Gerardo

customer_reviews.title: It's large but BEYOND functional
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS TUB! I HAVE 7 KIDS! TRUST ME! I ordered after researching tubs for about a month. Love that it "grows" with my baby. I also love that I can bathe my small 3 year old and my 3 month old at the same time. Wish I had this from the 1st child. STURDY! I will sell this when they outgrow it, and recommend it in my mom groups!
customer_reviews.author: Ebony D

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Its perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Its perfect. Spacious, great alternative if you don't have a bath tub. I let my baby take baths in the living room and i can sit comfortably on the floor next to the tub while my baby plays with a few bath toys. Washing the baby is comfortable, easy to move from either side to clean baby body parts. Draining is a bit draining, but thats because i have the tub in the living room instead of a location where water can drain. This is not a small tub you fit over the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: This is as close as we could find and I'm so far pleased with our purchase
customer_reviews.text: We have only showers in our house so we really really need a basic toddler bathtub with no frills. This is as close as we could find and I'm so far pleased with our purchase. I love that there is no BPA or other harmful chemicals...that was my first requirement. I wish it didn't have the molds in it for the smaller babies, but I can see how people want something to grow with their baby through toddlerhood. It is big though, so if you don't want big, this won't be for you. I personally wanted big, and it was the biggest I was able to find.
customer_reviews.author: StaceyA

customer_reviews.title: Huge!!!! Amazing size for big babys!!!
customer_reviews.text: Huge bathtub for kids!!! Is the bigest one you can find outthere for your kids. Mine is 9 months and he's so big I was having a hard time trying to find one for him, thank god I found this one and is bigger that I though. He will fit probably till turns 2. Best buy ever.
customer_reviews.author: Gladys M Perez

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: love it! Was so worried this would not fit into our smaller claw foot tub - but decided to chance it. IT FIT! thank goodness! bath time was a bit stressful when we were using another tub that had a sling....no one found bath time relaxing. This tub definitely made baths so much more fun! the important thing to us is that it's made in the USA and free of pba and all those terrible things that are now in plastics. Done and done. going to get one for the grandparents house too!
customer_reviews.author: Noa

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect. If I would if come across it sooner... I had to get two. One traditional one, which my baby grew out of in no time, and this one, which is perfect for small babies and big, fast growing once.
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana

customer_reviews.title: Great for our tub fearing 1 year old!
customer_reviews.text: Our 12 month old daughter LOVES bathtime....however, she was too big for her infant bath and she was horribly frightened of the bath tub for whatever reason. I bought this in hopes that it would work and it’s honestly the best thing ever! It’s just like her infant bath but 2 times bigger. It fits on our countertop and it’s the perfect size. And she loves it! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Blessedwith4

customer_reviews.title: we don't have a tub downstairs and we have a closet we can store it in so I'm very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned, look at the dimensions because this thing is huge. That said, we don't have a tub downstairs and we have a closet we can store it in so I'm very happy with this product. It supports my baby well at 18 lbs, 3 months old, and it supported him well 6 weeks ago. He loves bath time in this, he splashes and laughs. It takes a big section of our kitchen counter and doesn't fit on our sink, but it drains easily into the sink. We'll definitely get lots of use out of this tub.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for low muscle tone
customer_reviews.text: The only bath I could find that worked for my son with Down syndrome. He has low muscle tone and needs something bigger because he cannot sit up on his own at 14 months.
customer_reviews.author: Allison V.

customer_reviews.title: Safe bath
customer_reviews.text: I like this tub for my 18 month old. I have used these tubes for 4 children and have always been happy with them. They are large enough for the older toddler and dont let them slide around too much.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Smith

customer_reviews.title: she loves it!
customer_reviews.text: biggest one i could find, perfect for my 3 year old (going on 4) who is too large for her old one. She loves it, the color is great, the baby seat is a perfect little play area for her toys, who she slides down it. Also nice for pouring water into. Large for storing however but just what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jay R. Dee 2

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son over a year ago because we only have a stand up shower in our home and it’s amazing! He’s a big boy and still has plenty of room. I loved all the ergonomic designs because it held him in place before he was sitting up on his own. Strong material.
customer_reviews.author: The goat lady

customer_reviews.title: Best Bathtub Hands Down
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had high dollar and the main stream bath tubs! This is by far best bathtub ever can use from newborn through three years old! Love it because even though mine can sit up the reclined seat allows for easy hair washing. Purchased the spout water thermometer and setup is now perfect for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: KSS House

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love it! My 6m old love baths and this bathtub makes it easy to fill up and clean! I did get this bath pillow from someone who suggested it in these reviews! I love it! great for when he was 5 m old for help him sit up and not slip around. I love how i can have 2 babies in it! one on each side.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Great tub
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter around 4 months after she outgrew the newborn insert in her old tub. It fits great in our tub and supports her nicely. I like that it’s large enough for her to play in as she grows. I have other tubs that “grow” with your baby and they’re all way smaller.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Best bath tub ever ♥️
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this item three times over the course of being a foster mom. Babies of any size lay perfectly in the area and do not move. Toddlers can sit opposite end of where baby lays. The material is not flimsy and can hold two children if choosing to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Lottalove

customer_reviews.title: It's huge!
customer_reviews.text: It's made so well. Was purchased as a gift for a baby shower and didn't realize how large it would be, but mom absolutely loved it. She can place it in the tub, or on the counter, whichever is easiest.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina

customer_reviews.title: Nice roomy tub that works well for infant and baby
customer_reviews.text: This tub is great. It's small enough to fit in our bathtub, and big enough for baby to grow into it without being cramped. The infant seat keeps him in place with the spot for his bottom, and the sides keep him from sliding sideways. The other end will be perfect when he can sit up on his own, and there will be plenty of room for him to play with his toys and duckies. It is a challenge to store it if you don't just leave it to dry in the bathtub, but we have a space under our counter where it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: chewbecca

customer_reviews.title: Save your back!
customer_reviews.text: Love our 4moms infant tub, but my baby quickly outgrew it. I bought this after a TON of research. I now realize that I could have bought this one first since it has two different baby positions - Laying down and sitting up so I plan to use this until my baby can stand up in the shower. I refuse to wash my baby while kneeling in/next to the bathtub and the knee/back pain associated with it. Place the tub on the kitchen counter and stand up. Baths are a snap and so much easier on the body! Great value too!
customer_reviews.author: Skeptical

customer_reviews.title: Giant baby tub
customer_reviews.text: This thing is massive! We just stuck it inside our whirlpool tub and it works great. Cuts down on water used for us and just dump and rinse when bath time is over. Perfect for 8 month and 3 year old as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this tub
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this tub! I just purchased it for my 7 month old grandson. I had him sit it in after opening it up and he played with his toys in it for about 1/2 hour. He sat up perfectly in it and loves it! His mother was also excited that she could lay him back to rinse his hair. He will get ALOT of use out of this tub and will be perfect when they give me another newborn grandbaby :-)
customer_reviews.author: Jule Preston

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves this tub. He's 5 months old and the infant position works great. Easy to get him in and out. This tub is definitely larger than other tubs we had considered and we're happy we'll be able to continue using this for awhile. The tub drain is a nice feature. All in all a great product. And it's made in the USA!
customer_reviews.author: LGraham

customer_reviews.title: A bath without toxins. Thank you geezuz!
customer_reviews.text: It took me a long time to find this tubby for my baby. I went through several. This one is comfortable and easy to clean and empty and fill. It comes without the toxins many tubs are made with. Baby is comfy. I like to put a soft towel under the baby side for more comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Honest consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great tub that will last for a long time.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my newborn who is now 2 months old. Initially I used this bath in conjunction with the Summer Infant Comfy Bath Sponge. This tub is huge and will last my little guy for a long time. Seems very well made and has an easy release to empty the water out. I did notice that despite that it does not actually drain all the water out. Not a big deal and is easily remedied by turning the tub upside down.
customer_reviews.author: Chandra

customer_reviews.title: Very innovative design, perfect for all ages.
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger than our first baby bath which is what we were looking to upgrade to. My child slides forward when trying t rinse his hair so we may need to add some non slip pads to the bottom. It is designed perfectly inside to accommodate children from birth until they are ready fro the regular tub. It is very spacious and my son is off the charts in height so it's perfect for us. I don't reccommend buying from this seller though because we received a used dirty bathtub and had to return, buy it from someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Tanisha Cook

customer_reviews.title: Best baby tub ever!!! Seriously!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this baby tub! It's big but it allows my toddler to still have a bath. My favorite thing and selling point about this tub is it's super easy to clean!!! I had another one (The First Years Sure Comfort Deluxe Newborn to Toddler Tub) and whoever designed it obviously never planned on cleaning it. When I'm done I just hang in up on a command hook on the shower. I tell all my friends about this tub!
customer_reviews.author: IdahoGal6

customer_reviews.title: Your Baby will love this.
customer_reviews.text: Real nice product. Fits in a full-size tub. Babies will automatically know it’s play time when they get in. Much less messy than the sink also. Price was excellent
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Crosscheck

customer_reviews.title: Not what we expected.....
customer_reviews.text: So, we're returning this tub for two reasons. One, its HUGE, and I mean, huge. Like 3 feet long. I must have missed the measurements somehow. Two, the description says that its for babies 0-24 months but the tub label and packing specifically says for babies 6 months and older. It is so big that I completely understand not putting a tiny newborn in there. Anyway, just our opinion. Sending back for a smaller, more infant oriented one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby girl loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time last night and baby girl LOVED IT! She's a little wiggler so bath time was a huge chore for me & I wanted to get something we could both enjoy. Well worth every penny. She splashed around & laughed the whole time =) If she gets too excited she does tend to slide down and I have to slide her back up, but nowhere near as bad as before.
customer_reviews.author: Kynlies Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Not for very young babies
customer_reviews.text: Bought this due to the large positive reviews. I have a 6 month old, who isn't sitting completely on her own yet. The mesh bath that I had for her had gotten moldy and old and so the plastic tub looked to be more viable to me for hygiene purposes. Baby slips in this tub a lot. Wish there was a better way for her to be propped up. I have to use a towel hung on the back of the tub to keep her from slipping down. As she gets older though, I think this would be a perfect tub.
customer_reviews.author: chica

customer_reviews.title: This is the very best bathtub for babies
customer_reviews.text: This is the very best bathtub for babies. I used this is my bathtub even past the point where my children (all three) could sit up. It was large enough for them to splash around and happily play yet, gave both of us a feeling of security that they wouldn't slide around. I ordered this for both set of grandparents to have at their homes as well. I also purchase them for baby gifts...super, super little bathtub that you will absolutely get your money out of.
customer_reviews.author: thirdgentxan

customer_reviews.title: Best baby bath
customer_reviews.text: I was determined to find a reasonably priced, high quality bath for my newborn and when I came across this one I feel in love with the size, quality, and price. I use it in conjunction with the Summer Infant Comfy bath sponge and my lil one loves bath time and I love how stress free if makes bath time for both of us. In addition, I love how the bath is molded and that it will last well until my baby is a toddler. It's simple but is the best baby bath out there!
customer_reviews.author: Angela M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Love this tub!! It's a great size and genuinely feels like a kid size bathtub. It has the two sides, one for a layer and one for a sitter. It's easy to clean and drain. I'll be keeping this until she outgrows it because it saves water from filling the big bathtub. Sizewise I'd say it will fit her for quite a while
customer_reviews.author: AshleyRenee

product_meta.title: PRIMO EuroBath, Pearl White
product_meta.description: Color:WhitePRI-340W Features: -Largest baby bath available - holds 38 quarts of water.-Safety posts help prevent baby from slipping under water.-Built-in drain and two areas for baby bathroom accessories.-Add plastic tie loop and EuroBath can be hung on wall or door hook to save on storage space when not in use.-Made of durable polypropylene plastic.-Reclined: 0-6 months.-Sitting: 6-24 months.
feature_bullets: Unique anatomical shape with safety supports forearm and legs. Optional Folding Bath Stand available
Largest baby bath available - provides years of use with your baby. Features two compartments for shampoo, sponges, and bath toys
Easy to use drain, easy to clean plastic construction, and storage areas
Made in USA - BPA free, lead free, and phthalate free
Baby bath for ages 0 - 24 months with 2 bathing positions (infant and toddler)
Unique anatomical shape with safety supports forearm and legs, keeping the child in the ideal bathing position, prevent them from slipping underwater
Largest baby bath available - provides years of use with your baby, measuring in at 36"x21"x10"
Easy to use drain, easy to clean plastic construction, and storage areas
Made in USA - BPA free, lead free, and phthalate free
Baby bath for ages 0 to 24 months with 2 bathing positions, 0-6 month infants are bathed in reclining position and 6-24 month toddlers are bathed in sitting position

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,534 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
